titleStmt.title: Aurora Containing the first fancies of the authors youth, VVilliam Alexander of Menstrie.
titleStmt.author: Stirling, William Alexander, Earl of, 1567 or 8-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Field for Edward Blount,

notesStmt.note: Probably issued as part of: The monarchick tragedies: London, 1604.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
